General.Name: Dental Corporation Public Company Limited
General.Description: Dental Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the dental related business in Thailand. It provides dental diagnosis and general dentistry, dental implants, cosmetics dentistry, endodontic dentistry, oral surgery, periodontics dentistry, prosthodontic dentistry, and orthodontic dentistry services. The company also imports and distributes dental materials and equipment. Dental Corporation Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
